channel.title: Underwater barrel of death
channel.description:
When there's a barrel in water, sometimes when you touch it, something happens where it starts sinking to the bottom really fast, dragging you with it.
I just got killed because of it.
I'll get more information if it happens again or when I've finished the game and I manage to recreate it.

item.title: Underwater barrel of death
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
That happened to me once. Nearly drowned to death.

Read full topic

item.title: Underwater barrel of death
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Suhov
item.description:
Looks like you’ve discovered a rare species of underwater barrelnacle.

Read full topic
